Package items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
farm.FarmItem
items.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bonemeal, Brush, FeedBag, Fertiliser, Grain, Shampoo
public abstract class Item
extends FarmItem
Logic and structure superclass to construct different Items (consumables).

This class provides each crop with the logic and structure required, by expanding on the FarmItem structure.
Used as consumables to boost daily actions

Author:
Alex Burling(arb142), Jonathon Howe(joh29)
See Also:
Bonemeal, Brush, FeedBag, Fertiliser, Grain, Shampoo

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void endDay()
    Implements superclass abstract method At the end of the day, Item's shouldn't change anything about the farm (as they are consumables used with player actions) this is just an empty method.

    • endDay

      public void endDay()
      Implements superclass abstract method At the end of the day, Item's shouldn't change anything about the farm (as they are consumables used with player actions) this is just an empty method. Must exist for: ((for FarmItem item: farmitems): item.endDay()).
      Specified by:
      endDay in class FarmItem
